docs.text: Intro Hello Mani, Last week I told you I'd get back to you about your private mining pool project on freelancer.com and be able to provide more insight than I could at the time. In these docs, I will cover what I think are the two best available options which you can choose from, CoinumServ and ric-nomp . I mentioned CoiniumServ in my proposal, and I still believe that is a decent option to go for. However, I would actually recommend ric-nomp instead of that for a few reasons: It has more security features, and features in general Usability is easier Well documented Built for scalability I will get back to ric-nomp, but for now I'll go over your requirements again.

However, I would actually recommend NOMP instead of that for a few reasons: It has more security features, and features in general Usability is easier Well documented Built for scalability I will get back to ric-nomp, but for now I'll go over your requirements again.
